query: SELECT TABLE_NAME FROM information_schema.TABLES WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = DATABASE() AND (TABLE_NAME LIKE '%orchestr%' OR TABLE_NAME LIKE '%content_performance%' OR TABLE_NAME LIKE '%platform_adaptations%' OR TABLE_NAME LIKE '%optimization_history%');
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3GtrSVWktBvDbNd.730b1d7910c0 --database 3Ss8KhjHmMbtxkDLhxH8t9 --execute SELECT TABLE_NAME FROM information_schema.TABLES WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = DATABASE() AND (TABLE_NAME LIKE '%orchestr%' OR TABLE_NAME LIKE '%content_performance%' OR TABLE_NAME LIKE '%platform_adaptations%' OR TABLE_NAME LIKE '%optimization_history%');
